      • findRail

        public org.bukkit.block.Block findRail(org.bukkit.block.Block pos)
        Description copied from class: RailType
        Tries to find this Rail Type near a 'next' Block returned by RailType.getNextPos(Block, BlockFace). Unlike RailType.findRail(MinecartMember, World, IntVector3) this method does not allow special adjustments based on Minecart information.
        Specified by:
        findRail in class RailType
        Parameters:
        pos - Block a Minecart is 'at'
        Returns:
        the rail of this type, or null if not found

      • getNextPos

        public org.bukkit.block.Block getNextPos(org.bukkit.block.Block currentTrack,
                                org.bukkit.block.BlockFace currentDirection)
        Description copied from class: RailType
        Gets the next Block while moving on this type of Rail. The goal of this method is to find out where Minecarts that enter this rail end up at when moving forward.

        If the result is null, then this Rail Type forcibly disallows that direction from being used, and no movement was possible.

        Specified by:
        getNextPos in class RailType
        Parameters:
        currentTrack - of this rail type the 'Minecart' is using to drive on
        currentDirection - the 'Minecart' is moving
        Returns:
        next Block to go to after moving over this rail

      • getDirection

        public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getDirection(org.bukkit.block.Block railsBlock)
        Description copied from class: RailType
        Obtains the direction of this type of Rails. This is the direction along minecarts move.
        Specified by:
        getDirection in class RailType
        Parameters:
        railsBlock - to get it for
        Returns:
        rails Direction
